issue.title: IDE with debugging for docker using ignition

content.raw:
I set up an own dockerfile to build a new image based on the subt docker image. In this docker file I included the installation of eclipse-cdt, which was a bit tricky. Using this new image I’m able to use eclipse for the development and use the debugging in eclipse. 

Today I‘m a little bit busy. If you want it, I can upload the dockerfile tomorrow evening.
content.html:
I set up an own dockerfile to build a new image based on the subt docker image. In this docker file I included the installation of eclipse-cdt, which was a bit tricky. Using this new image I’m able to use eclipse for the development and use the debugging in eclipse.

Today I‘m a little bit busy. If you want it, I can upload the dockerfile tomorrow evening.
